topic.title: Any Chinese Learner ?
topic.body:
I am Chinese ,and i'd like to learn English by email with native speakers.
and I think it's also a good chance to say THANK YOU ZERONET.
I like the true internet~
(so if you are an English speaker and would like to learn Chinese , it means you can input Chinese no matter what level——>email me _@tiotry)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
here is my plan ：
you email me in Chinese ，I will reply you with English.（let's all do it as much as possible，It's the most direct exercise.）
Let's heip each other correct the spell or grammar faults under the reply by write the proper expression in "[ ]". (In my opinion ,your fault can be the attractive textbook for me to learn about English thinking , It might be suit for you to learn Chinese ,too~)

1509423252_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nw.body: resilio已死，就算有人给你密钥你也接不了吧

> [kai0](#comment_411_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): 不是已死，是节点太少。

所以说已死啊，公用的服务器都在墙外了，sad。。。还在找替代品，这不找到零网来了

1510821243_1CxzW1WSzp2bYT7HAsLcw1wt1USDm.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_214_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): styromaniac

I don't mean I need a teacher, but a peer who will make mistakes in learning Chinese.
I think share mistakes is a good way to know about the other culture.
I would definately appreciate that if you still glad to be my "pen pal" ~
If so , e-mail me by ZeroMail. ( I don't actually know about how to use it up to now...)

> [imchenjiaojiao1](#comment_1_1CdCKeKB5ojQnqDp3XBtteoikH5vNPo45f): 学个屁英语

in the board ,just English OK? I need a partner to use English ,not just to know it, and I can't approach reddit.com either （i don't know if it's because GFW）.

> [imchenjiaojiao1](#comment_6_1CdCKeKB5ojQnqDp3XBtteoikH5vNPo45f): no,the fucking gov never banned those sites,as well as yahoo japan,wikipedia(expact chinese-like language),...many,once most chinese cant read it.recently xvideos and pornhub has unlocked,LOL，i always wonder why dont many sites be banned by gov.

your English is quite well !( in my opinion ),then why would you say  "don't learn English" ?

> [xieyang](#comment_1_1D6jqNm9GkL62DLnPmaqc8xZBYSKXR5dx1): i can 't send a mail to you for the address will lost after i fill you email addr to the address box

just type in "tiotry" as the user's name , please try it again.( ZeroMail only )

> [zeroid000](#comment_1_19k9HhwRsEhpPPtmEwxYvjakUb124KrDRm): 这全是英语，想学自己看啊，还要找个人给你发邮件。哈哈

Not just to learn English , that's why I set the title as "Any Chinese Learner ?" , It's the most impotent .
Besides ， In this board ，English only OK？ Please respect the persons who offer you the ZeroNet.

> [zeroid000](#comment_2_19k9HhwRsEhpPPtmEwxYvjakUb124KrDRm): 《Tao-Te Ching》Chapter 5 [...]

sorry ，i don't know what do you mean . Find it in Chinese ? 
I mean Chinese learner is someone who should use Chinese talk to me by email (and that's why i  emphasized to use ZeroMail. )

Well , You are Chinese... just wasting our time . maybe you can @ me in
http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit/?Topics:12_1NV87VmSkezRyz8NbFpdkYJsJUSfXx7LJa/

> [zeroid000](#comment_3_19k9HhwRsEhpPPtmEwxYvjakUb124KrDRm): 回复你中文，你说别人不尊重作者，回复你英文，你又说不懂意思。你为什么就不敢直接说出你的意思。拖泥带水的，含含糊糊的，一点也不光明磊落。还想别人尊重你的规则。你尊重过我的规则吗？

I didn't noticed your ID，using English is to prevent English speakers neglecting the post .
so , can you delete all your replies in Chinese ? 
I can talk to you in Chinese board ...using  Chinese .

> [zeroid000](#comment_4_19k9HhwRsEhpPPtmEwxYvjakUb124KrDRm): 你不是圣人你的话并不是全对，很可能很多错误。请你谦虚点。

Why are you so aggressive ? If my words makes you feel uncomfortable ,then mute me.
Cause I will , see you ~

> [littlefucker](#comment_5_12QBNnnWMchCNsy1TaARZanAkgKrZLtXLt): 我记得zeronet的开发者是瑞典的还是瑞士的吧。。。虽说网络是美国发明的，但那样的话你应该吧最后一句改成“internet"

You can build a new board ，then you will find out why i said “English only”

> [imchenjiaojiao1](#comment_7_1CdCKeKB5ojQnqDp3XBtteoikH5vNPo45f): 怎么删除？你能找到删除按钮吗？

float your mouse In the lower left corner of your name ，there would be an icon like a pen. Click it , so you can modify your words.

> [imchenjiaojiao1](#comment_8_1CdCKeKB5ojQnqDp3XBtteoikH5vNPo45f): 学英语上课听听就行了，别把玩的时间用来憋英语。

You didn't get what i am saying. Not just to learn English as a language , I'd like to possess English thinking.

> [ismdeep](#comment_3_1797XvTKzCfDFwRXhQem5UVNSB95FkGFw3): 多读原著，顺便推荐几个新闻网站。http://lite.cnn.io http://news.ycombinator.com

Thanks ， it a good way and I am trying it ， but a director is better ~
